member.name: NSTCITEMSTATE
member.summary: Specifies the state of a tree item. These values are used by methods of the interface.

member.name: NSTCITEMSTATE.NSTCIS_NONE
member.summary: The item has default state; it is not selected, expanded, bolded or disabled.

member.name: NSTCITEMSTATE.NSTCIS_SELECTEDNOEXPAND
member.summary: Windows 7 and later. The item is selected, but not expanded.
